責任制漁業準則: Code of Conduct for Responsible Fisheries

亞洲近岸海域礦產資源聯合勘探協調委員會[礦產聯勘協委會]: Committee for Co-ordination of Joint Prospecting for Mineral Resources in Asia Offshore Areas (CCOP)

海水成分恆定性: constancy of composition of sea water

連續運轉的水質監測: continuous on-stream monitoring of water quality

瀕危野生動植物種國際貿易公約: Convention on International Trade in Endangered Species of Wild Fauna and Flora (CITES)

黑潮及鄰近水域的合作研究: Cooperative Study of the Kuroshio and Adjacent Regions (CSK)

通用海洋水深圖: GEBCO (general bathymetric chart of the oceans)

紅外線量子放大器: infrared amplifier by stimulated emission of radiation ( IRASER )

國際海洋物理科學協會: International Association for the Physical Sciences of the Ocean (IAPSO)

國際氣象學與大氣物理學協會: International Association of Meteorology and Atmospheric Physics (IAMAP)

世界自然保護聯盟: International Union for Conservation of Nature and Natural Resources (IUCN)

國際大地測量及地球物理學聯合會: International Union of Geodesy and Geophysics (IUGG)

國際理論與應用化學聯合會: International Union of Pure and Applied Chemistry (IUPAC)

同位素稀釋表面電離質譜法: isotope dilution surface ionization mass spectrometry

世界自然保護聯盟紅色名錄{瀕危物種}: International Union for Conservation of Nature (IUCN) Red List

地球深部取樣海洋聯合機構: Joint Oceanographic Institutions for Deep Earth Sampling (JOIDES)
